trans-unit.source: $tagRECT structure that contains the logical coordinates of the bounding rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the logical coordinates of the bounding rectangle.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the logical coordinates of the bounding rectangle.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

seg-source.mrk: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

target.mrk: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

seg-source.mrk: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

target.mrk: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the starting point of the arc.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

seg-source.mrk: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

target.mrk: The x-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

seg-source.mrk: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

target.mrk: The y-coordinate, in logical units, of the ending point of the radial line defining the ending point of the arc.

trans-unit.source: The arc is drawn using the current pen; it is not filled. The current position is neither used nor updated by _WinAPI_Arc() function.

seg-source.mrk: The arc is drawn using the current pen; it is not filled.
The current position is neither used nor updated by _WinAPI_Arc() function.

target.mrk: The arc is drawn using the current pen; it is not filled.
The current position is neither used nor updated by _WinAPI_Arc() function.

trans-unit.source: Use the _WinAPI_GetArcDirection() and _WinAPI_SetArcDirection() functions to get and set the current drawing direction for a device context.

seg-source.mrk: Use the _WinAPI_GetArcDirection() and _WinAPI_SetArcDirection() functions to get and set the current drawing direction for a device context.

target.mrk: Use the _WinAPI_GetArcDirection() and _WinAPI_SetArcDirection() functions to get and set the current drawing direction for a device context.

trans-unit.source: The default drawing direction is counterclockwise.

seg-source.mrk: The default drawing direction is counterclockwise.

target.mrk: The default drawing direction is counterclockwise.
